resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82249</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82249</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4205</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">An Anchronistic Newspaper</string>
            <string language="es">Un periódico anacrónico</string>
            <string language="ga">Nuachtán Mí-aimseartha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Anchronistic Zeitung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un Journal d'Anchronistic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um Jornal De Anchronistic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un Giornale Di Anchronistic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια εφημερίδα Anchronistic</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Guidelines for producing a newspaper set in another period of history which may help deepen children's understanding of the people and events of that time.</string>
            <string language="es">Directrices para producir un conjunto de periódicos de otra época de la historia que puede ayudar a profundizar la comprensión de los niños sobre la gente y los sucesos de aquel momento.</string>
            <string language="ga">Treoirlínte chun nuachtán a choláthar atá suite i dtréimhse staire eile a chabhróidh le tuiscint na ndaltaí ar dhaoine agus imeachtaí an ama sin.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SESE History</string>
            <string language="es">Historia SESE. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">OSIE Stair</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Korrekturlinien für das Produzieren einer Zeitung
stellen in eine andere Periode der Geschichte ein, die helfen kann, 
Verständnis der Kinder der Leute und der Fälle dieser Zeit zu 
vertiefen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les directives pour produire un journal placent 
dans une autre période de l'histoire qui peut aider à approfondir 
l'arrangement des enfants des personnes et des événements de ce 
temps.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os guidelines para produzir um jornal ajustam-se 
em um outro período do history que possa ajudar aprofundar a 
compreensão das crianças dos povos e dos eventos desse tempo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La guida di riferimento per produrre un giornale 
si regola in un altro periodo di storia che può contribuire ad 
approfondire la comprensione dei bambini della gente e degli eventi di
quel tempo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι οδηγίες για την παραγωγή μιας εφημερίδας θέτουν σε 
μια άλλη περίοδο ιστορίας που μπορεί να βοηθήσει να εμβαθύνει 
την κατανόηση των παιδιών των ανθρώπων και των γεγονότων εκείνου 
του χρόνου.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SESE Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoire de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">History de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia di SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιστορία SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4205</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

END:VCARD</entity>

          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>teacher</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <language>en</language>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">11-13</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>lesson plan</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
FN:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
ORG:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>

FN:Tomas O'Briain
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>

        </classification>

  </description>
